text: innum, avar tam tay tantaiyarai ariyacanattin mitu uyartti (amartti)nar; avarkal (ellorum) avarukku (mariyatai celuttiyavarkalakac) ciram panintu vilntanar; appotu avar (tam tantaiyai nokki), "en tantaiye! Itu tan ennutaiya muntaiya kanavin vilakkamakum; atanai en iraivan unmaiyakkinan; melum, avan ennaic ciraiccalaiyiliruntu veliyakkiyatutan enakkum en cakotararkalukkumitaiyil saittan pirivinaiyai untu panni vitta pinnar unkalai kiramattiliruntu kontu vantatan mulam avan niccayamaka enakkup perupakaram ceytullan; niccayamaka en iraivan, tan natiyavarrai mika nutpamakac ceykiravan, niccayamaka avan (yavarraiyum) nankarintavan; mikka nanamullavan" enru kurinar
